advertiser_id.title: Advertiser ID
advertiser_id.description: TikTok advertiser identifier used for the reports API.

access_token.title: Access Token
access_token.description: Long-lived token generated from the TikTok Business API.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: UTC date to begin incremental collection (YYYY-MM-DD).

lookback_window_days.title: Lookback Window
lookback_window_days.description: Days to subtract from the checkpoint when replaying incremental slices.

slice_span_days.title: Slice Span
slice_span_days.description: Number of days to request per API call.

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: Number of rows to fetch per request.

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: Timezone used for the stat_time_day field.
